Pamac is a Gtk and CLI front ends of libpamac Features - pamac: an easy CLI - pamac-manager: a Gtk4 GUI - pamac-tray: a Gtk3 tray icon with updates notifications - pamac updates indicator: a gnome-shell extension with updates notifications Installing from source Pamac uses Meson build system. In the source directory run: Translation If you want to contribute in Pamac translations, use Transifex.
